"Powerful hostile readings picked up on the sensors!
We think it's more of the same kind we're
currently engaged in battle with!"

"This is an urgent message. We have detected
the presence of powerful hostiles.

"強力な敵性存在の反応検知！

各員、通常任務に戻って下さい。"

"Powerful hostile readings on the scanner.
It seems to be more of the same type
we are currently in battle with."

"This is an urgent message.

"強力な敵性反応が近づいている。
